segments.text: Now I understand . But I don't smoke or drink.So what am I supposed to buy in here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can buy some of these nice butterflies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm sorry . I don't think it is nice to have butterflies mounted in boxes.It is kind of disgusting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? You feel sorry for the butterflies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I think they should just let them fly free , and not try to sell them to foreigners . It is a kind of destruction of nature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I agree with you . I'd rather think that the butterflies are flying around in the mountains . I just wonder if they really catch so many that it affects the butterfly population .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who knows ? Hey , I like these jade bears here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one is 2300 dollars.Maybe I should buy it for my mother . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want . Didn't you buy her a small vase already ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but she would like this a lot . She likes to collect little things like this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . Buy it then . I won't buy anything . Well , maybe I'll buy some Cognac .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I could buy some Cognac for my brother . He always drinks it .
segments.speaker: S1
